original_text: That is why people called the city Babel. It was because the Lord confused all the people of the world and he gave them different languages to speak. From that time, the Lord separated the people from each other so that they lived in different places all over the earth.
korean_text: 그러므로 그 이름을 바벨이라 하니 이는 여호와께서 거기서 온 땅의 언어를 혼잡하게 하셨음이니라 여호와께서 거기서 그들을 온 지면에 흩으셨더라

sentences.original_text: That is why people called the city Babel.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 사람들이 그 도시를 바벨이라 불렀습니다.

sentences.original_text: It was because the Lord confused all the people of the world
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 온 세상의 모든 사람들을 혼란시키셨기 때문입니다.

sentences.original_text: and he gave them different languages to speak.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들에게 말할 다른 언어들을 주셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: the Lord separated the people from each other
so that they lived in different places
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 다른 곳에 살게 되었습니다
